channel.title: Handler delta

item.title: Handler delta
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

hey, im making handler and i dont know where to add the things i mean its dialogueoptionâ€¦ but do i declare anything in server.java or somewhere for it to load? here is the handler

[code]public class Dialogueoption {

public void dialogue(int d){

client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[d];
switch(c.actionButtonId) {

case 9157:

if(c.NpcDialogue == 2){
c.closeAll();
c.NpcDialogue = 3;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

if(c.NpcDialogue == 4){
c.closeAll();
c.NpcDialogue = 5;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

if(c.NpcDialogue == 9){
c.closeAll();
c.showInterface(14924);
}
break;

case 9158:
if(c.NpcDialogue == 2){
c.closeAll();
c.NpcDialogue = 300;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

}
}
}[/code]
